name: @szn-ds/css
description: CSS implementing the principles of Seznam Design System ready to be included in a project

scripts.//: minifikace je fake a oboje by melo jeste pouzivat autoprefixer
scripts.build:css: mkdir dist && lessc src/sds.less dist/sds-${npm_package_version}.css --autoprefix="> 1%, last 2 versions, not ie 10"
scripts.build:minified: npm run build:css && lessc src/sds.less dist/sds-${npm_package_version}.min.css --autoprefix="> 1%, last 2 versions, not ie 10"
scripts.post: cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp -a -R src/. dist/ && npm publish dist
